prompts: Create a playful Pokemon that looks like a small pink bulldog with blue polka dots.
I want a cartoonish creature with an expressive face and oversized ears, embodying cuteness.
Generate a character design for a Pokemon that has a mix of dog and fairy-like features.
Make a whimsical Pokemon that appears grumpy but has a heartwarming personality.
Imagine a creature that combines elements of a dog and a plush toy, using soft colors.
Design a Pokemon that is friendly but also has a tough demeanor, suitable for a battle.
Give me a character concept for a small bipedal Pokemon with distinct pink and blue colors.
